CustomField.description: Indicates emails should be sent today
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( Type__c, "Pre-Session" ), DATEVALUE( Service_Session__r.pmdm__SessionStart__c ) - Days_Offset__c == TODAY() ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Type__c, "Post-Session" ), DATEVALUE( Service_Session__r.pmdm__SessionStart__c ) + Days_Offset__c == TODAY() ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates emails should be sent today
CustomField.label: Is Send Date
